attributes.action: leave the disability benefits and pensions alone they cant afford to live now
attributes.additional_details: how can the government justify taking £750 pp from there state pensions and how do they justify means testing disabled ppl these are the poeple who need more help the coalition needs a reality check come on poeple dont just sit back and let them squeeze the very heart and soul out of us .there are pensioners now scratching about to try and get enough money for a meal.
